author: dblevins
msg: Removed CoreUserTransaction's usage of static OpenEJB.  Also removes ability to do a java:comp/env/UserTransaction lookup from outside a ejb call.

author: dblevins
msg: Put the guts of the OpenEJB class into a non-static class.  Added a context map to hold stuff needed during building.  So far just need the TransactionManager.

msg: Commented on the usages (55 of them)
